content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (53.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5) storing coal

### Copper Ore Mining and Transport System at Position (-23.0, -68.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (-23.5, -69.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-23.5, -69.5) storing copper ore
- Transport Belt network connecting various positions including (-24.5, -69.5), (-22.5, -69.5), (-21.5, -69.5), (-21.5, -68.5), (-24.5, -67.5), (-24.5, -66.5), (-23.5, -66.5), (-21.5, -67.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Transport System at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5) storing iron ore
- Transport Belt network connecting positions (-12.5, -54.5), (-12.5, -55.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -54.5) transferring items between chests and belts

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) producing iron plates
- Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) storing coal, iron ore, and iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) transferring items between chests

### Belt Networks
- Multiple Belt Groups are present, facilitating the transport of materials between various facilities. Notable positions include:
  - BeltGroup at positions such as (-25.5, -70.5) to (-23.5, -70.5), (-21.5, -66.5) to (-21.5, -68.5), and others.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without having them in inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
